p: Twenty-four hours after transfection or eight hours after infection at high m.o.i. or 24â€‰hours after infection at low m.o.i., cells were solubilised in LDS sample buffer (Invitrogen) supplemented with beta-mercaptoethanol. Proteins were separated by polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis (NUPAGE, Invitrogen), followed by western blotting. Rabbit anti-influenza A virus NS1 polyclonal antibody was a kind gift from D. Marc (INRA-Nouzilly, France). Rabbit anti-influenza A virus NA polyclonal antibody was purchased from GeneTex. Anti-beta-actin (Abcam) and anti-GAPDH (ThermoScientific) were used for cellular controls.
